a.xlink:title: Returns the AbilityCooldowns of the abilities
Initialize the actual Stats of the Player.
Initializes all the values and colors for this Player.
This method initializes the EffectManager with the proper HUD Controller to start showing the effects...
Copies the Character initial values to the actual Stats script
Initializes all the values into the Image and Text.
Sets the current level and xp to the Image.
Calculates the actual normalized fill amount for the image.
When you heal HP, we will reset the lerped bar
This function is called whenever this ability is ready and you have enough mana.
